name: Dance Fight
description:
Dance Fight is a Beat 'em Up Brawler Game, Also with Cool Dance Moves !

- Single Player (Player vs AI)

- Hand-to-Hand combat

- Kickboxing Style

- Enemy AI

- Several Moves

- Combos that take precise timing to execute moves
- For example forward/forward/Y gamepad button will perform the super punch
- Throw - You can pick your opponent up by the neck and slam their head into the ground

- 2.5D Side View

- Several Challenging Levels

Use WADS or Left Thumbstick to Move
Use JKLI (Keyboard) OR ABXY (Gamepad) to Hit/Kick
9 Key or Left Shoulder to Block

- Features Fun Dance Moves
(Use D-PAD or Arrow Keys)

* NOTE : ALL Videos & Music are from Copyright Free Sources *
